import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; import { Post } from "src/app/models/posts"; import { LikesService } from "src/app/services/LikesService.service"; import { PostsService } from "src/app/services/posts.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-home", templateUrl: "./home.component.html", styleUrls: ["./home.component.css"], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { time: string = new Date().toLocaleString(); likes: number = 0; posts: Post[] = []; constructor( private postService: PostsService, private router: Router, private likesService: LikesService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.postService.getPosts().subscribe((posts: Post[]) => { this.posts = posts; }); this.postService.getPosts().subscribe((posts: Post[]) => { this.posts = posts; for (const post of this.posts) { this.likesService.getLikes(post._id).subscribe((likes) => { post.likes = likes; }); } }); } postDetalis(_id: string): void { this.router.navigate(["/content-page/detalis", _id]); } addLike(postId: number) { const likes = this.getLikesFromStorage(); likes[postId] = true; this.saveLikesToStorage(likes); } unlikePost(postId: number) { const likes = this.getLikesFromStorage(); delete likes[postId]; this.saveLikesToStorage(likes); } }
